fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.meter

Class ElectricMeter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.meter.ElectricMeter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, ElectricMeterImplementationI

    public class ElectricMeter
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements ElectricMeterImplementationI
    The class ElectricMeter implements a simplified electric meter component.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       ELECTRIC_METER_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !ELECTRIC_METER_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       X_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0
 invariant       Y_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0
 invariant       TENSION != null
 invariant       TENSION.getData() > 0.0
 invariant       TENSION.getMeasurementUnit().equals(MeasurementUnit.VOLTS)

    Created on : 2023-09-19

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
